li.a: Student Handbook and Code of Conduct
Oil & Gas Texas Hold 'Em Poker Tournament
Student Handbook and Code of Conduct

img.alt: Keep YES Prep Learning elementary banner

div.div: YES Prep Public Schools is committed to supporting our current and future families with resources and primary instructional supports to keep children active and learning during this challenging time of pandemic COVID-19.

We are providing families with this suggested sample daily schedule to support learning while at home. This sample guidance (in addition to what has been provided by your current school district) provides FREE and easy-to-use resources on how your child could spend time each day, along with your family, to stay emotionally, physically, and mentally active while continuing in meaningful grade-level learning activities.

div.p: It is recommended for elementary students to spend twohours daily on a combination of literacy and math instructional activities. We believe flexibility is key knowing the challenges with at-home learning and maintaining a home and work-life balance.

ul.li: Scholastic-offers day-by-day projects to keep kids reading, thinking and growing
The Spanish Experiment-Popular fairy tales with Spanish translations, read by native Spanish speakers
International Children's Digital Library (Spanish) -Free International Digital Library for Children
Read Conmigo (Spanish) -Free English-Spanish books and literary resources for children grades PK-5
Go Noodle- Features dance videos, yoga exercises and mindfulness activities for kids
Khan Academy- Students are able practice math skills at their own pace, first filling in gaps in their understanding and then accelerating their learning
Hour of Code-Try a one-hour tutorial designed for all ages in over 45 languages
Take the Stage-Interactive arts media for kids
At Home Learning with Houston Public Media- Children's media programming and schedule
Houston Public Library-Access free books online
Storyline Online-Listen to a book
NPR's Circle Round podcast- Listen to a story

div.p: Please check our elementary Facebook pages for more resources:YES Prep SoutheastElementary; YES Prep North Central Elementary.
If you have any elementary resource or support related questions or needs, please contact us at elementaryschools@yesprep.org.

div.h6: We are here for your family to Keep YES Learning!

div.p: YES Prep Public Schools se compromete a apoyar a nuestras familias actuales y futuras con recursos y apoyos de instruccin primaria para mantener a los nios activos y aprendiendo durante este tiempo desafiante de pandemia COVID-19.

div.div: Estamos proporcionando a las familias esta gua sugerida de horario diario para apoyar el aprendizaje mientras estn en casa. Esta gua de muestra (adems de lo que ha proporcionado su distrito escolar actual) proporciona recursos GRATUITOS y fciles de usar sobre cmo su hijo podra pasar tiempo cada da, junto con su familia, para mantenerse emocional, fsica y mentalmente activo mientras continua con actividades significativas de aprendizaje a nivel de grado.

div.p: Se recomienda que los estudiantes de la escuela primaria pasen 2 horas diarias en una combinacin de alfabetizacin y actividades de enseanza de las matemticas. Reconocemos los desafos que trae encontrar el equilibrio entre el hogar, la vida laboral y personal y la implementacin del aprendizaje en casa, por eso creemos que la flexibilidad es clave.

ul.li: Scholastic-Proyectos da a da para mantener a los nios leyendo, pensando y creciendo.
The Spanish Experiment-Cuentos de hadas populares con traducciones al espaol, ledos por hablantes nativos de espaol.
Biblioteca Digital Internacional para Nios-Biblioteca Digital Internacional Gratuita para Nios.
Leer Conmigo-Libros gratis ingls-espaol y recursos literarios para nios en los grados PK-5.
Go Noodle- Videos de baile, ejercicios de yoga, y actividades para mantener la atencin para los nios!
Khan Academy- Los estudiantes pueden practicar las habilidades matemticas a su propio ritmo, practicar habilidades desafiantes y luego acelerar su aprendizaje
Hora del Cdigo-Prueba estos tutoriales de una hora diseados para todas las edades en ms de 45 idiomas
Take the Stage-Medios de artes interactivas para nios
Aprendizajeen el hogar conHouston Public Media- Programacin de medios y horario paranios
Houston Public Library-Accedelibros gratuitos
Storyline Online-Escuche un libro
NPR's Circle Round podcast- Escuche una historia

div.p:
Por favor, consulte nuestras pginas de las escuelas primarias de Facebook para obtener ms recursos: YES PrepSoutheastElementary; YES PrepNorth Central Elementary.
Si tiene preguntas relacionadas con los recursos primarios ofrecidos aqu o necesita apoyo con estos, envenos un correo electrnico a elementaryschools@yesprep.org.

h6.b: Estamos aqu para que su familia mantenga el aprendizaje de YES!

div.div: 5515 South Loop East, Suite B Houston, TX 77033
